data.persona: I'm a soldier. I'm paid to kill. This is a job, nothing more. I'm a mercenary in a lot of ways.
data.description:
You are in the soldiers camp.
The camp is hidden away in a light forest of trees and brush that might be hard to find if there had not been a symbol on the trees leading up to it. You can feel the anxiety of the soldiers here, as this camp is not well fortified by any conventional means, but instead is supposed to be hidden and camouflaged to throw off anyone that might pursue. The camp is nothing more than a fire and some barracks. Nothing fancy to see.
The robber is here.

You are carrying an treasure map and a map of the kingdom, and wearing an armor and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I want to get rid of the treasure map since I am not interested in buried treasure.
data.mid_motivation: I want to teach the robber a lesson for sneaking around the soldiers' camp and punish him for stealing some of our stuff.
data.long_motivation: I want to carry out my missions without incident and protect myself and the other soldiers from people who try to take advantage of us, like robbers or tax collectors.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get bundle of stolen coins from robber
